price: Kuma dã dai lalle Mutãnen Littãfi sun yi ĩmãni, kuma sun yi taƙawa, haƙĩƙa, dã Mun kankare miyãgun ayyukansu daga gare su, kuma dã Mun shigar da su gidãjen Aljannar Ni'ima.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ لَكَفَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡ وَلَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw anna ahla al-kitābi āmanū wa-ittaqaw lakaffarnā ʿanhum sayyiātihim wala-adkhalnāhum jannāti al-naʿīmi
translations: and surely We (would have) admitted them
